title: Mind blown. Tv show from 2020 about vaccines used to sterilize people - Page 3
cleaned_text:
DO NOT WATCH THE AMAZON WOKE CRAP, IT'S CASTING AND EXECUTION OF THE DENNIS KELLY ORIGINAL STORY IS DUMB DOWNED FOR AMERICANS.Sorry for the caps, but it was yelling to get my point across.Much love!

Re: Mind blown. Tv show from 2020 about vaccines used to sterilize people 



could there be a slight decrease? Sure...Just not seeing it real time, and nobody is struggling to have a kids...at least because of the vax...its the age old problem of bad egg, or bad sperm.



Asked some NICU RNs what their experience is since Covid/Vaccinations...



No Real Difference. (maybe its just the area I live in) 



I could still believe and pull for a genetic passdown effect...



All of us that got it, aren't really effected...it will be our children.



Not sure about double vaxxed parents vs single, and the effects that might occur.



Currently I know a ton of medical workers (both vaxxed), having kids, and kids so far are totally healthy.



But like I said..We would have to wait about 15+ years to know what the true genetic damage is, if any.

 "Everything's perfectly all right now. We're fine. We're all fine here now, thank you. How are you?" -Han Solo and yet me and my vaxxed friends and coworkers are all popping out babies left and right...could there be a slight decrease? Sure...Just not seeing it real time, and nobody is struggling to have a kids...at least because of the vax...its the age old problem of bad egg, or bad sperm.Asked some NICU RNs what their experience is since Covid/Vaccinations...No Real Difference.
